HomePage.heroSubtitle: Leading electrical contracting services in Kurdistan / Sulaimanyah, specializing in lighting repair & maintenance, new construction and renovations, and large-scale commercial projects.
HomePage.aboutText: Electrical Load is a leading provider of electrical contracting services servicing Kurdistan / Sulaimanyah. We specialize in lighting repair & maintenance, new construction and renovations, and large-scale commercial projects.
HomePage.servicesSubtitle: From electrical installation to solar systems, we deliver complete, guaranteed solutions.
HomePage.service1Desc: Professional electrical shop drawings prepared according to project and site requirements.
HomePage.service2Desc: Full electrical installation for residential, commercial and industrial projects.
HomePage.service3Desc: Network cabling, data points and communication infrastructure for modern facilities.
HomePage.service4Desc: Design and assembly of main and sub electrical boards with full protection systems.
HomePage.service5Desc: Design and installation of solar panel systems using high-efficiency modules and smart inverters.
HomePage.service6Desc: Ongoing maintenance and after-sales support for all installed systems.
HomePage.projectsSubtitle: A portfolio of major electrical projects across commercial, residential and governmental sectors.
HomePage.contactText: Get in touch with us for consultations or project inquiries. We're here to help with all your electrical needs.

AboutPage.title: About Electrical Load
AboutPage.subtitle: Electrical Load is a leading provider of electrical contracting services in Kurdistan / Sulaimanyah, focused on quality, safety and long-term partnerships.
AboutPage.missionDescription: Provide innovative and sustainable electrical and energy solutions with full expertise in the field, working guarantee, and faithful execution by our engineers and employees.
AboutPage.visionDescription: To be a leading service provider recognized regionally and globally for innovation, efficiency and commitment to our clients and community.
AboutPage.value1Description: We use top-tier international brands designed for local conditions, backed by long-term warranties for peace of mind.
AboutPage.value2Description: Our projects are executed by skilled engineers and technicians with a focus on precision, safety and deadlines.
AboutPage.value3Description: We provide routine maintenance and rapid response to technical issues long after installation is complete.
AboutPage.teamSubtitle: From leadership to field technicians, our team delivers safe, reliable, and professional electrical solutions.

CareerPage.title: Career Opportunities
CareerPage.subtitle: Join our team and help shape the future of electrical engineering
CareerPage.position1Description: We are looking for an experienced electrical engineer to join our team. You will work on designing and implementing electrical systems for various projects.
CareerPage.position2Description: Lead and coordinate electrical projects from conception to completion. Manage teams, budgets, and timelines to ensure successful project delivery.
CareerPage.position3Description: An excellent opportunity for recent graduates to start their career in electrical engineering. We provide mentorship and growth opportunities.
CareerPage.benefit4: Flexible working hours and remote options

FuturePage.title: Our Future
FuturePage.subtitle: Discover our roadmap and vision for the years ahead
FuturePage.goal1Description: We are investing heavily in research and development to stay at the forefront of electrical engineering innovation. Our goal is to integrate AI and IoT technologies into our solutions.
FuturePage.goal2Description: Expanding our presence to new markets and regions, bringing our expertise and solutions to clients worldwide. We aim to establish offices in key strategic locations.
FuturePage.goal3Description: Committed to sustainable practices and green energy solutions. We are working towards carbon-neutral operations and promoting renewable energy integration.
FuturePage.goal4Description: Building a diverse and talented team of professionals. We plan to double our workforce over the next three years while maintaining our culture of excellence.
FuturePage.roadmapStep1Description: Strengthen our core services and expand our team with top talent. Launch new product lines and establish key partnerships.
FuturePage.roadmapStep2Description: Introduce AI-powered solutions and expand into new markets. Focus on sustainable energy projects and green technology integration.
FuturePage.roadmapStep3Description: Become a recognized leader in the industry. Expand globally and establish ourselves as the go-to partner for complex electrical engineering challenges.

Footer.description: Professional electrical contracting and installation services for residential, commercial, and industrial projects.

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: Complete electrical and energy solutions from design to execution.
ServicesPage.description: We handle shop drawings, electrical and network installation, board design and assembly, and modern solar panel systems for residential, commercial and governmental projects.
ServicesPage.service1Desc: Preparation of accurate electrical shop drawings in line with project specifications and site conditions.
ServicesPage.service2Desc: Execution of all electrical works including wiring, boards, cable trays, earthing, and protection systems.
ServicesPage.service3Desc: Installation of network drag functions, data lines, and communication systems for reliable connectivity.
ServicesPage.service4Desc: Design, fabrication and installation of main and sub distribution boards with full coordination and protection.
ServicesPage.service5Desc: High-efficiency solar panel systems with smart monitoring, long lifespan and maximum energy production.
ServicesPage.service6Desc: Routine inspections, fault finding and long-term after-sales support for all installed systems.
ServicesPage.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today for a free consultation

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.subtitle: Get in touch with Electrical Load Installation Company
ContactPage.description: Contact us for project inquiries, technical consultations or partnership opportunities.

ProjectsPage.title: Our Works
ProjectsPage.subtitle: Key electrical and energy projects delivered by Electrical Load.
ProjectsPage.description: Our portfolio covers commercial complexes, showrooms, hospitals, villas, checkpoints, governmental buildings and solar system installations across Kurdistan and Iraq.
